title: Solicitudes de Acceso
deleteRequestConfirm: ¿Está seguro de que desea eliminar esta solicitud de acceso?
newServiceUserDescription: Crear un nuevo usuario de servicio para esta solicitud
serviceUserNameHelp: Use solo letras, números y guión bajo (_). Sin puntos ni caracteres especiales.
serviceUserDescriptionHelp: Describa el propósito de este usuario de servicio (máx. 200 caracteres)

action.viewTitle: Detalles de la Solicitud de Acceso
action.syncError: La sincronización de permisos falló después de la aprobación

wizard.title: Create Access Request
wizard.serverStepSubtitle: Choose the server you want to request access to
wizard.databaseStepSubtitle: Choose the database you want to request access to
wizard.schemaStepSubtitle: Choose the schema you want to request access to
wizard.tableStepSubtitle: Choose the tables you want to request access to
wizard.tableStepSubtitlePostgres: Choose the tables you want to request access to in this schema
wizard.tableStepHelp: Select the tables you need access to for your work
wizard.accessTypeStepSubtitle: Choose the type of access you need
wizard.durationStepSubtitle: Choose how long you need the access for
wizard.permanentAccessDesc: Access will remain active until explicitly revoked
wizard.temporaryAccessDesc: Select an expiration date for access
wizard.expirationDateInfo: Access will be automatically revoked after this date
wizard.autoRevocationNote: Note: Automatic revocation occurs at the end of the day on the specified date.
wizard.justificationStepSubtitle: Explain why you need this access
wizard.justificationInfoText: Provide a clear and detailed explanation of why you need this access. A good justification helps speed up the approval process.
wizard.justificationPlaceholder: Explain why you need access to these database resources...
wizard.justificationHelp: Please provide a detailed explanation of why you need access to these resources. A clear justification increases the likelihood of your request being approved quickly.
wizard.reviewInstructions: Please carefully review the details of your request below. If needed, you can go back to edit any section.
wizard.confirmationText: Click 'Confirm' to submit this access request. You will be notified when it is processed.
wizard.userStepSubtitle: Select the user who needs access to database resources
wizard.userStepHelp: Select the user who needs access to database resources.
wizard.requesterInfo: As a requester, you can only create access requests for your own account.
wizard.noDatabases: No databases found for the selected server
wizard.noSchemasAvailable: No schemas available for this database
wizard.noTables: No tables found in the selected database
wizard.readOnlyDescription: Permission to view data only, without making changes
wizard.readWriteDescription: Permission to view and modify data, but not delete
wizard.adminDescription: Full access to all operations including deletion
wizard.temporaryAccess: Access for a limited time period
wizard.permanentDescription: Access that has no expiration date and will remain valid until explicitly revoked
wizard.temporaryDescription: Access for a limited time period that will automatically expire on the specified date
wizard.expirationNote: Note: Temporary access requests require approval by an administrator. Consider specifying a reasonable timeframe for your request.
wizard.publicSchemaInfo: The "public" schema is the default schema in PostgreSQL. All tables will be created in this schema unless specified otherwise.
wizard.informationSchemaWarning: The "information_schema" contains database metadata. This is a system schema and usually requires administrative permissions.
wizard.pgCatalogWarning: The "pg_catalog" schema contains system tables and functions. This is a system schema and usually requires administrative permissions.
wizard.schemaHelp: Select the PostgreSQL schema you want to request access to

validation.tableRequired: Please select at least one table
validation.justificationTooShort: Justification must be at least 10 characters

error.failedToLoadDatabases: Failed to load databases. Please try again later.
error.noDatabasesAvailable: No databases available for this server.
error.noServersAvailable: No servers available. Please contact the administrator.
error.noUsersAvailable: No users available. Please contact the administrator.
error.noTablesFound: No tables found in this database.
error.failedToLoadSchemas: Failed to load schemas. Please try again later.
error.failedToLoadTables: Failed to load tables. Please try again later.

database.publicSchemaTooltip: El esquema público es el esquema predeterminado donde se crearán sus tablas
